name: Food App UI Kit (Freebie)
description:
Food App is a comprehensive directory of food delivery screens. UI kit consisting of 60+ screens and the full UX flow for your next big food delivery app! 


Features:

✅ Complete user flows

✅ 64 Screen composition

✅ Icons and Illustrations

✅ Colors following WCAG standards

✅ Free font used (Inter)


What's Included

Full high-fidelity UX & UI Flow (64 Screens):

  • Splash Screen (3 Screens)
  • Sign up & Login (7 Screens)
  • Profile & Settings (23 Screens)
  • Search (3 Screens)
  • Home, Restaurant (9 Screens)
  • Order & Delivery (10 Screens) 
  • Support (9 Screens)


Presentation material (11 Screens):

  • Figma covers (3 Artboards)
  • Dribbble Shots (4 Shots)
  • Instagram presentation in square format (4 Screens)


For the full version please consider checking my Gumroad: https://app.gumroad.com/ndro#lGKKT
